ygData.subject: Re: Harvest Stone
ygData.msgSnippet: The harvest stone is suppose to summon 10 foods per everquest week.  You click on it and it will summon one food per attempt.  After you use up the 10 it no
ygData.messageBody:
The harvest stone is suppose to summon 10 foods per everquest week. You
click on it and it will summon one food per attempt. After you use up the
10 it no longer be available till a full everquest week has passed.

Personally i have used them but i have never had one recharge itself, so im
not sure whether they are functional or not. Others may know

The spring stone functions the same way, only it summons 10 waters.

Lance

-----Original Message-----
From: Cillo, Christopher L. [mailto:CLCILLO@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 8:44 AM
To: 'Innoruuk List'; 'Spoilers'; 'EverQuest'
Subject: [EverQuest] Harvest Stone


From: "Cillo, Christopher L." <CLCILLO@...>

Anyone know what a Harvest Stone is and how it works?

Thanks,

Chris aka Thunderheart
Level 19
Wood-Elf
Druid
Innoruuk server
